analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol#89) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol#115-122)

Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol#89)
VIRALTOKEN.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol#206-207)
VIRALToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol#18-20)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x546e955456867a5822bb9532973f7380f1bf55a1.sol:
